node.name: FTP Enumeration
node.rich_text:
Here I am going to exploit the ftp by enumerating username and password through bruteforcing. The following is a part of a Lab.
Checking the version of the ftp using an auxiliary module of ftp
Then setting the wordlist for user_id and password for auxiliary/scanner/ftp/ftp_login module to bruteforce the user_id and password
Then ran exploit to enumerate the user_id and password
The user_id and password is enumerated, now login to ftp 192.9.109.3 and enter the user_id and password.
